Class BookRepositoryImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301f20t21.bookfriends.repositories.impl.BookRepositoryImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BookRepository

    public class BookRepositoryImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements BookRepository
    implementation of BookRepository, contains methods that directly interact with Firebase Firestore and Firebase Cloud Storage
